name: CF Bankshares Inc.
description: CF Bankshares Inc. is a financial services company headquartered in Columbus, Ohio, operating primarily through its wholly-owned subsidiary, CF Bank. Established in 1892, CF Bankshares offers a range of banking and financial services, including commercial and residential lending, deposit accounts, and wealth management solutions. The company focuses on serving individuals, small businesses, and commercial clients in its regional market. With a commitment to community banking, CF Bank emphasizes personalized customer service, competitive rates, and a strong understanding of the local economy. CF Bankshares aims to leverage technology to enhance customer experience while maintaining a traditional banking approach that values relationships. The company is also dedicated to responsible lending practices and financial education, helping customers make informed decisions about their financial futures. CF Bankshares is committed to growth and sustainability, seeking to expand its footprint while maintaining the high standards of service that have defined its legacy for over a century.

seo.meta_title: CF Bankshares Inc. | Community-Focused Banking Solutions
seo.meta_description: Discover CF Bankshares Inc., a community-focused bank offering a variety of lending and depository services. Learn about our commitment to customer service and financial education.

faq.question: What services does CF Bankshares offer?
faq.answer: CF Bankshares offers lending services, deposit accounts, and wealth management solutions.

faq.question: Where is CF Bankshares headquartered?
faq.answer: CF Bankshares is headquartered in Columbus, Ohio, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of CF Bankshares?
faq.answer: William J. McGowan is the CEO of CF Bankshares Inc.
